title: FS: Lot of 14 Lower Grade T207 Commons w/ Livingston (Small "c")

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 14 Lower Grade T207 Commons w/ Livingston (Small "c")
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T207 cards for sale or trade. These are lower grade cards as the scans will show. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!
